body.name: PAVOI 14K Gold Plated Stackable Rings Set for Women | 3 Chunky Statement Rings Pack | Stackable Bands Set
features: Add a touch of style with our trendy set of three stackable rings. With a total width of 16mm when stacked together, these rings make a statement whether worn together or separately. The top and bottom rings are a sleek 4.7mm, while the middle ring stands out at 10mm. These rings are perfect for those who love mixing and matching their jewelry to fit their mood and outfit.

Our set of stackable bands has got that Hollywood-style bling going on, thanks to its rhodium plating. And guess what? It has a long-lasting finish, that is totally nickel-free, cadmium-free, lead-free, and hypoallergenic. Perfect for rocking every day or when you want to shine on special occasions.

✦ 60-DAY GUARANTEE ✦ Your happiness is our number one priority. To ensure your complete satisfaction, we offer a hassle-free 60-Day money-back guarantee. To get in touch, email or chat with us - a member of our team will be happy to help you.

✦ SUSTAINABILITY ✦ PAVOI is dedicated to sustainability throughout our entire product cycle. Our jewelry is made from 100% recycled materials and we package in 99% recycled materials. We work to reduce our carbon emissions and offset plastic consumption by removing 275,000 bottles from oceans annually. We are committed to maintain a balanced and eco-friendly business that minimizes our environmental impact. Trust that PAVOI is continuously working towards a greener future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Three rings in one!
reviews.reviewText: Three rings for the price of one! The Pavoi white gold statement rings are just what I'd been looking for.It is hard to find 'white gold'/silver rings, everything out there is 'gold'. The rings are all separate and can be stacked or warn individually.They run a teeny tiny bit snug when all three are stacked. Ordered a size 7 for my actual ring finger. A full size up would have allowed me to wear them on two other fingers. But I really like the versatility of separating them for a different look each day. Pavoi suggests removing them for hand washing which I am guilty of not doing. The white gold might be just a touch darker than my white gold wedding ring set, but are very shiny and not cheap looking at all. When wearing all three rings stacked, they do tend to scoot around and need to be realigned.This is a nice set of rings that I plan to wear daily. Nice find!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great, shiny bold statement rings
reviews.reviewText: I love everything I've tried from this brand! High quality, gift worthy packaging. Beautiful shiny finish, pleasant light buttery gold tone. These are comfortable yet bold chunky stacking rings. Love that you can wear them separately or together. I think they might run just a bit large but fit fine. Will continue to follow this brand! Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These rings, as with countless Pavoi pieces, are really beautiful. Very trendy amorphic shape and aesthetic I just didn’t find them flattering or stylish on my hands (mostly size 8/8.5 finger sizes for these) but if you have long slender fingers with long nails like some of the reviewers, they are really complimentary!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made set
reviews.reviewText: A really cute ring set that you can wear together or alone. Nice, seamless gold metal finish. They feel like quality pieces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty statement ring
reviews.reviewText: I love the Pavoi brand, their products are always quality at a very affordable price point. This is a three ring set, all separate pieces. So you’re getting three rings in one package. The metal of this ring is shiny but not in a fake way. It is comfortable to wear and does not irritate my skin. When worn together, these rings make an impact and create a statement ring.The only issue I’m having w this ring is getting them to stack up evenly. The curves to the rings create a nice aesthetic but, maybe it’s just me, it takes some fidgeting to get them lined up like in the advertised picture. I got a size 5 which is my typical size and it is TTS, but the rings do shift a bit around the finger which results in sometimes you having to realign them. I wish they fit together just a little bit more snugly, but it won’t stop me from wearing this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These rings look very nice. You can wear them individually or stack them. I really like the way they look stacked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely as expected
reviews.reviewText: Pavoi is that girl! Pieces are always as pictured and nice quality. Rings have weight to them. Nicely made, nice shine. Sizing seems a little smaller than usual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These rings are so pretty in person. They look and feel substantial. High polished gold and super shiney. I love how chunky they are. Great set from Pavoi.
